2. The video, which features Jesse and Melissa Meek rapping in a car, has been viewed over 1.7 million times on YouTube.
3. The couple shared a sonogram of their unborn child at the end of the video, which was made for loved ones to know about the baby.
4. The original song for 'The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' was sung by the show's star, Will Smith, and details how his character grew up in West Philadelphia.
5. The Meeks are expecting a child and their son will be the great-great-grandson of Oregon pioneer Joseph Lafayette Meek.
